a1: I like football too, there are some good teams.
q2: Juventus is my favorite, great for decades.
a2: I think Madrid is better, for decades, with its star players, they won everything
q3: Who is the best Goalie to ever play?
a3: Sepp Maier will forever remain a Bayern Munich legend.
q4: Real Madrid is the best team in the world
q5: Who is the best team in France?
a5: Paris SG is the best team in France in my opinion.
